description: Provide real-time and historical weather data, forecasts, alerts, and station information from the WeatherXM decentralized weather network worldwide. Enable detailed weather insights including temperature, wind, precipitation, UV index, and data quality assessments. Discover nearby weather stations and explore network coverage for comprehensive weather analysis.

apiKey.description: WeatherXM Pro API key required for accessing weather data

capabilities.name: get_current_weather
capabilities.description: Get current weather conditions for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_for_location' or 'search_weather_by_location' instead.

capabilities.name: get_hourly_forecast
capabilities.description: Get hourly weather forecast for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_forecast_for_location' instead.

capabilities.name: get_daily_forecast
capabilities.description: Get daily weather forecast for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_forecast_for_location' instead.

capabilities.name: get_stations_near
capabilities.description: Get a list of WeatherXM stations within a specified radius from a location. Uses the stations/near endpoint with radius in meters.

capabilities.name: get_historical_observations
capabilities.description: Get historical weather observations for a specific WeatherXM station on a specific date. Use this when you already know the station ID and want to see past weather data. Note: Only recent past dates are supported (typically last few days). Future dates are not supported.
